system.description: You can make a third attack with your off-hand weapon when fighting with two weapons.
system.prerequisites: Dex 19, Improved Two-Weapon Fighting, Two-Weapon Fighting, base attack bonus +11
system.benefit: You get a third attack with your off-hand weapon, albeit at a -10 penalty.
system.special: A fighter may select Greater Two-Weapon Fighting as one of his fighter bonus feats.
